sentences.en: All these changes are so unsettling.
sentences.cn: 这些变化都使人心神不定.

sentences.en: Change was unsettling, but also imperative.
sentences.cn: 变动使人心烦, 可是又少它不得.

sentences.en: Floating exchange rates are unsettling to world trade today.
sentences.cn: 今天浮动汇率对国际贸易起着不稳定作用.

sentences.en: His sense of humour was really unsettling.
sentences.cn: 他的幽默感确实令人不安。

sentences.en: Hosting Uranus in this area of your life can be unsettling.
sentences.cn: 主办这天王星的生活领域,可以不安.

sentences.en: It has been a frightening and unsettling experience.
sentences.cn: 尽管这是令人害怕和不安的经历.

sentences.en: It was an unsettling show. There was a hallucinatory feel from the start.
sentences.cn: 这是场让人心绪不宁的演出，一开始就有一种虚幻感。

sentences.en: Lightning is a particularly unsettling product of bad weather.
sentences.cn: 闪电是恶劣天候之下,格外令人不安的现象.

sentences.en: Or it could be the permanently unsettling nature of the human predicament.
sentences.cn: 又或者是因为人类不安的本性.

sentences.en: Phil had several unsettling dreams every night.
sentences.cn: 菲尔每晚都做好几个令他不安的梦。

sentences.en: Scoring an advance in reproductive technology as unsettling as it was startling.
sentences.cn: 在生殖技术上取得的这一进步既使人惊奇,又令人担忧.
这则新闻实在扰乱人心.

sentences.en: The prospect of change of this kind has an unsettling effect on any organisation.
sentences.cn: 这种变化的前景对任何组织都有不确定的影响。

sentences.en: The shift may also prove unsettling to the world's formal multilateral institutions.
sentences.cn: 世界的变迁也可能让全球官方多边机构不安.

sentences.en: The twin peaks image has a further unsettling implication.
sentences.cn: 两座高峰的概念隐含着更多令人不安的方面.

sentences.en: This is a very good and unsettling article.
sentences.cn: 这是一篇很好但同时又使人不安的文章.

words.tran_cn: 使人不安的；（消息）扰乱的

trans.tran_cn: 使人不安的，（消息）混乱的
trans.tran_en: If you describe something as unsettling, you mean that it makes you feel worried or uncertain
